description: Adam Bryant is married to the woman of his dreams, but when Billy Santoro offers him one million dollars to have sex with him, it is an offer he can’t refuse. Even Adam’s wife agrees that a bit of cock won’t do Adam any harm, especially as he is always asking for anal. Billy is left more than satisfied as he gets just what he paid for in the form of Adam’s thick, hard dick in his mouth, then deep in his hole.
title: An Offer He Can't Refuse
